name: Scary Games゜
description:
◆Haunt Prank◆ has an intention to prank your all neighborhood. This application appears to be an easy gaming feature, But the victim is being secretly video-recorded without knowing. While the victim is playing, a demon creature suddenly jump out with unexpected scary sound ;)
 
▶ INSTRUCTIONS ◀
1. Turn up the volume.
2. Start the app and play any modes of the game.
3. Bring the victim to a quiet area where he/she can focus e.g like dark silent room.
4. Hand the app to the victim you wish to scare.
5. Wait for a few seconds.
6. You got their scared moment captured on video.
7. Now share the video with everyone via Facebook ;)

▶ APPLICATION MODES ◀
1. Spot Differences
2. Dot Concentrate
3. Camera

If you like this app please rate it on the app store. This motivates us to make our apps even better. Thank you very much!

PLEASE: Do not show this app to people under 12 or people with faint of heart. Also - most people will drop the phone - beware of this! Best if people are sitting down.
